GSD.description:
ALSA: usb-audio: Fix an out-of-bounds bug in __snd_usb_parse_audio_interface()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.143 by commit 6123bec8480d23369e2ee0b2208611619f269faf. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ALSA: usb-audio: Fix an out-of-bounds bug in __snd_usb_parse_audio_interface()
